import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgotten-password', templateUrl: './forgotten-password.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forgotten-password.component.css'] }) export class ForgottenPasswordComponent { }

forgotten-password works!
